title: AFFORDABLE HOUSING WEST LOS ANGELES, MOVE IN SPECIAL
posting_body: ['1 MONTH FREE on 12 Month Lease!', 'Studio Arnaz', '320 Arnaz Drive, Los Angeles, CA, 90048', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 6', 'OR Text', '6', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Welcome to STUDIO ARNAZ!', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 330 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to your new home at Studio Arnaz Apartments!', 'ONE MONTH FREE MOVE-IN SPECIAL', 'Studio Arnaz Apartments is steps away from Cedars Sinai Hospital and is just minutes from Rodeo Drive and UCLA.', 'Grab a bite to eat at countless high-end restaurants and find limitless shopping at The Beverly Center, Beverly Connection, and The Beverly Grove.', 'It’s a great choice to live for those who love to indulge in the finer things that Beverly Hills has to offer.', 'Studio Arnaz is an affordable community that has income and rent restrictions.', 'Income restrictions are dependent upon the household size.', 'Affordable rents starting at $2250, For a household of 1, Gross Annual Income Must be LESS than $99,330.', 'For a household of 2, Gross Annual Income Must be LESS than $108,100.', 'Please contact us for more information.', 'Features', '- Gas Range', '- Private Balcony', '- Refrigerator', '- Stove/Oven', '- Cable Ready', '- Elegant New Flooring', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Relaxing Gas Fireplace', '- Elevator', '- Dishwasher', '- Air Conditioning/Heating', '- Disposal', '- Window Coverings', '- Microwave', '- Walk', 'In Closet', 'Community Amenities', '- Controlled Access Entry Building', '- Onsite and On Call Maintenance', '- Walking Distance to Fine Dining', '- Recycling', '- Flexible Lease Terms Available', '- Professional Management', '- Laundry Facility in Building', '- Close to Upscale Shopping Centers', '- Assigned Parking - Carport/Garage/Open Space', '- Gated Access', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- Elevator', 'Driving Directions', 'Cross-Streets: Robertson Blvd and 3rd St', 'In between 3rd St and Burton Way on Arnaz Dr.', 'Office Hours', 'Tuesday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We love pets!', 'Certain dog breed restrictions may apply.', '25 lb Weight Limit.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Studio Arnaz is an affordable community that has income and rent restrictions.', 'Income restrictions are dependent upon the household size.', 'Affordable rents start at $2250.', 'Gross Annual Income for a household of 1 is $99,330.', 'Gross Annual Income for a household of 2 is $108,100.', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'Aq04o9WBvJF']
